trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControlCollection class manages a collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DirectoryControlCollection gere uma colecção de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControlCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DirectoryControlCollection cria uma instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Add adiciona um novo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object has been added.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> no qual o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: control is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método AddRange adiciona uma matriz de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objetos a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: controls is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlsé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A member of the array is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um membro da matriz é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: O método AddRange adiciona um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> objeto à coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: controlCollection is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlCollectioné uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object contains a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O método contém determina se este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> objeto contém uma determinada <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto que pretende procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto faz parte da coleção; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo copia o conjunto completo para uma matriz unidimensional, que começa no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiada a partir de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do `array` onde copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: array is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: arrayé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional - ou - o número de elementos na origem de é superior ao espaço disponível desde o index ao fim do destino array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da origem de não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de destino array .

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O método de IndexOf devolve o índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência de especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> do objeto para que o índice é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado de índice <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O método Insert insere especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> de objeto para o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection at which to insert the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O índice na coleção no qual pretende inserir a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> o objeto a inserir na coleção.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: valueé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero, or index is greater than the number of elements in the object.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero, ou index é superior ao número de elementos a objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> is read-only, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>é só de leitura ou <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: The Item property contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Contém a propriedade do Item de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Contém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: There was an attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma tentativa para definir a propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method verifies that value is a object.
trans-unit.target: O método OnValidate verifica se value é um objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve um valor.

trans-unit.source: Instead, an exception is thrown if the specified object is null or is not a valid <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, é emitida uma exceção se o objeto especificado é nulo ou não é um válido <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl>

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a avaliar.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: valueé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: value is not a object.
trans-unit.target: valueNão é um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método de remover remove a primeira ocorrência de especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> objeto para remover.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> is read-only, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>é só de leitura ou <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.
